name: City Surfer
description:
Disclaimer: This is tech work and thus all art and audio that has been used are not from me.

Left - Swipe left

Right - Swipe right

Jump - Swipe up

Roll - Swipe down

Power-ups - Tap on buttons

Known bugs:

- Slow-motion is infinite

- UI for upgrades always display 1 but after tapping is updated
